segmentosSRT.text:
Why don't you have a go?
Show them what it takes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
Why don't you go home?
There'll be other times.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
What's with you?
Can't take "no" for an answer?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: You want to make me lose face? Go away!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: No, Fugui's signature is on each one.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Long'er, is our Xu family home...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
A gambling debt's a debt,
and debts must be paid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: I thought I'd live my final days here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: I'll look after her for a few days?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Don't you see what they are?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: I've found just the man for her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: He is the leader of the factory's Red Guards.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: No, it was an accident at work.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
Shall we invite him over?
Fengxia can check him out.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text: Does she mind us playing matchmaker?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13

segmentosSRT.text:
She's not opposed,
she does fret about leaving us.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_13
